name: Mouseage
description:
Press E to start the game on the main menu.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

E - Interact

Q - Change Seasons

ESC - Restart Level

The music is a royalty free track by David Fesliyan

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/warm-light/355
